synopsis.text:
Find out about Umi, Sora, and Ao, the industrious sixth-grade sisters who manage the top-notch odd-jobs agency at Shonan Beach, Kamakura. They have an unparalleled reputation for tackling any task, from delivering items to battling monsters. But why aren't these young girls attending school? Living independently without parents, they even generate their own electricity through eco-friendly means.

When a worried mother seeks their help to persuade her son to return to school, the girls face an unexpected challenge. It turns out that teaching this boy about the importance of education might be their most demanding task yet. Will these versatile sisters, one of whom communicates through sign language, succeed in their mission? Delve into the captivating world of Grrl Power to discover their unique journey!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
